Error.Description: InstanceCollection: Attempted to acquire invalid Instance!
Error.Name: AttemptedToAcquireInvalidInstanceException

Error.Description: Versioning: Acquired invalid version - must have 4 components (delimiter is .)
Error.Name: InvalidVersionException

Error.Description: Versioning: Acquired invalid version - invalid owner or build date!
Error.Name: InvalidVersionAuxillaryInformationException

Error.Description: Versioning: Acquired invalid version - major, minor, revision, or private/compressed build date
Error.Name: InvalidVersionInformationException

Error.Description: EnumValue: Attempted to add EnumValue with zero-length or null to EnumInstance!
Error.Name: AttemptedToAddInvalidEnumNameException

Error.Description: An unknown exception occurred during the creation of an Instance and its addition to the DataModel.
Error.Name: DataModelInstanceCreationUnknownErrorException

Error.Description: Attempted to acquire a null parent for an Instance that does not have InstanceTags.CanHaveParentNull!
Error.Name: CannotAcquireNullParentException

Error.Description: The Workspace has been destroyed and is no longer in the DataModel.
Error.Name: TheWorkspaceHasBeenDestroyedException

Error.Description: Attempted to add an object that is not a ServiceStartupCommand to a ServiceStartupCommandCollection
Error.Name: AttemptedToAddNonServiceStartupCommandToServiceStartupCommandCollectionException

Error.Description: Cannot acquire GlobalSettings when it is not yet loaded!
Error.Name: CannotAcquireUnloadedGlobalSettingsException

Error.Description: Attempted to remove an Instance that is not in the DataModel or Workspace.
Error.Name: AttemptedToRemoveInstanceThatIsNotPartOfDataModelException

Error.Description: Attempted to remove an Instance from a Parent that it is not a child of.
Error.Name: AttemptedToRemoveInstanceThatIsNotAChildOfItsParentException

Error.Description: The Service Control Manager has failed.
Error.Name: ServiceControlManagerFailureException

Error.Description: Attempted to pass an invalid ServiceNotification to the Service Control Manager.
Error.Name: AttemptedToPassInvalidServiceNotificationException

Error.Description: Cannot convert a string without a comma or with more than one comma to a Vector2!
Error.Name: Vector2ConversionInvalidNumberOfComponentsException

Error.Description: Attempted to convert an invalid string or an object that is not a string! to a Vector2!
Error.Name: Vector2InvalidConversionException

Error.Description: Attempted to render an invalid texture!
Error.Name: AttemptedToRenderInvalidTextureException

Error.Description: Attempted to convert an invalid length hexadecimal colour string to a Color3!
Error.Name: ErrorConvertingHexadecimalColourException

Error.Description: Attempted to convert an invalid length relative colour string to a Color3!
Error.Name: ErrorConvertingRelativeColourException

Error.Description: Attempted to convert an invalid length colour string to a Color3!
Error.Name: ErrorConvertingCommaColourException

Error.Description: Attempted to load a RelativeColour where one or more of the components was outside of the range [0,1]!
Error.Name: RelativeColourOutOfRangeException

Error.Description: Failed to open the specified game. Currently this is just an error message - in the future we will have some nice UI.
Error.Name: FailedToOpenLgxException

Error.Description: Cannot run a script with an invalid name!
Error.Name: CannotRunScriptWithInvalidNameException

Error.Description: An error occurred obtaining a list of sounds to play!
Error.Name: ErrorAcquiringSoundListException

Error.Description: To use 3D sound, a Sound must have a Position and Radius!
Error.Name: Err3DSoundRequiresSoundPositionAndRadiusException

Error.Description: To use 3D sound, a Sound must have a target object!
Error.Name: Err3DSoundRequiresTargetObjectException

Error.Description: --overrideappid was specified without an appname to override, ignoring
Error.Name: OverrideAppIdSpecifiedWithNoAppId

Error.Description: Please provide a Game XML file to load!
Error.Name: GameXmlFileRequiredException

Error.Description: Cannot add a non-Tab to a TabCollection!
Error.Name: PolarisCannotAddNonTabToTabCollectionException

Error.Description: Attempted to populate TabUI when Tabs have not been loaded!
Error.Name: PolarisCannotPopulateTabUIWithNoTabsException

Error.Description: Cannot add a null message to the Polaris Output tab!
Error.Name: PolarisCannotAddNullMessageToPolarisOutputTab

Error.Description: An error occurred removing ambiguous matches for generation of instance information.
Error.Name: InstanceInfoErrorRemovingAmbiguousMatchesException

Error.Description: An error occurred acquiring the list of physical objects to render.
Error.Name: ErrorOccurredAcquiringPhysicalObjectListException

Error.Description: A Sky object must have a Texture!
Error.Name: SkyObjectMustHaveTextureException

Error.Description: Cannot add a non-Token to a TokenCollection!
Error.Name: CannotAddNonTokenToTokenCollectionException

Error.Description: Cannot add a Token with a Parent that is not in the TokenCollection to a TokenCollection!
Error.Name: CannotAddTokenWithParentThatIsNotInTokenCollectionException

Error.Description: The old Tokeniser has been removed as of June 1, 2021. Please use the AST Tokeniser instead!
Error.Name: OldTokeniserRemovedException

Error.Description: Cannot add an Instance to a Parent that is not in the InstanceCollection you are attempting to add it to!
Error.Name: CannotAddNonexistentInstanceToInstanceCollectionException

Error.Description: An ASTPattern must have at least three elements - cannot access its index 2 or below!
Error.Name: AstPatternMustHaveAtLeast3Elements

Error.Description: Lua state invalid or trying to parse a script before ScriptingService has started.
Error.Name: LuaStateFailureException

Error.Description: Cannot obtain a list of Lua scripts to run!
Error.Name: LuaCannotObtainListOfScriptsToRunException

Error.Description: Attempted to reinitialise the DataModel before it has been initialised!
Error.Name: ReinitialisingBeforeInitialisingDataModelException

Error.Description: Multiple scripts are running while not paused! That is not allowed - stopping all except the first...
Error.Name: CannotHaveMultipleUnpausedScriptsRunningException

Error.Description: Attempted to add an invalid function to the Lua sandbox!
Error.Name: AttemptedToAddInvalidFunctionToSandboxException

Error.Description: Attempted to convert a non-String to a list of strings.
Error.Name: AttemptedToConvertNonStringToStringListException

Error.Description: Attempted to add a non-TextChunk to a TextChunkCollection!
Error.Name: AttemptedToAddANonTextChunkToATextChunkCollection

Error.Description: Attempted to add a TextChunk with no length to a TextChunkCollection!
Error.Name: AttemptedToAddATextChunkWithNoLengthToATextChunkCollection

Error.Description: [WINDOWS ONLY] Attempted to pass a null or invalid Win32Point to Vector2.FromNativePoint(); -- position will be set to (0,0).
Error.Name: AttemptedToPassInvalidW32PointToVector2FromNativePointException

Error.Description: Failed to obtain list of GuiRoots - UIService will now crash!
Error.Name: FailedToObtainListOfGuiRootsException
